1.9.4.1.4.6:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.3.8
- Fixed the removePage and removeChapter methods in the MineTweaker integration
- Fixed the remove methods for rituals in the MineTweaker integration
- Any string specified as a Chapter title and/or Page text will be localized if possible
- Added a method for adding URL-based image Pictures in the MineTweaker integration
- Now runs on Forge 12.17.0.1976
1.9.4.1.4.5:
- Ported to Minecraft 1.9.4
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.2
- Bump to Better Questing 1.2.126
- ProjectE integration is back
- Now runs on Forge 12.17.0.1962

1.9.1.4.6:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.3.8
- Fixed the removePage and removeChapter methods in the MineTweaker integration
- Fixed the remove methods for rituals in the MineTweaker integration
- Any string specified as a Chapter title and/or Page text will be localized if possible

1.9.1.4.5:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.2
- Bump to Better Questing 1.2.114
- Now runs on Forge 12.16.1.1938
1.9.1.4.3: - Added Better Questing integration (you can add tasks for AbyssalCraft machines and rituals)
1.9.1.4.2.2: - The game shouldn't crash when certain integrated mods aren't present
1.9.1.4.2:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.1.6
- Now runs on Forge 12.16.1.1887
- You can now add Blocks to the Lesser Shoggoth Block Blacklist through MineTweaker/CraftTweaker
- You can now add Entities to the Lesser Shoggoth Food List through MineTweaker/CraftTweaker
- You can now remove Crystallizer/Transmutator recipes
- Added a Tinkers' Construct integration (you can smelt and cast parts from AbyssalCraft metals in the smeltery)
1.9.1.4.1:
- Ported to Minecraft 1.9
- Currently only contains the CraftTweaker integration
- Runs on Forge 12.16.0.1863
- Added Abyssalnite, Refined Coralium and Dreadium Dust (any mod with OreDict support should be able to use these right away)

1.8.9.1.4.6:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.3.8
- Fixed the removePage and removeChapter methods in the MineTweaker integration
- Fixed the remove methods for rituals in the MineTweaker integration
- Any string specified as a Chapter title and/or Page text will be localized if possible
- Added a method for adding URL-based image Pictures in the MineTweaker integration
- Re-balanced the aspects on the various wands added in the Thaumcraft integration
- Re-balanced the aspects for creating the wand components in the Thaumcraft integration
- Added Aspects to more blocks (ones added since AC 1.9.2)
1.8.9.1.4.5:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.2
- Bump to Better Questing 1.1.125

1.8.9.1.4.3: - Added Better Questing integration (you can add tasks for AbyssalCraft machines and rituals)
1.8.9.1.4.2.2: - The game shouldn't crash when certain integrated mods aren't present

- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.1.6

- You can now add Entities to the Lesser Shoggoth Food List through MineTweaker/CraftTweaker

1.8.9.1.4.1:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.1.1

1.8.9.1.4.0:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.0-pre-4

1.8.9.1.3.5:
- Ported to Minecraft 1.8.9
- Enabled Forge version checker
- EE3 integration is disabled (mod not updated)
- Thaumcraft integration is partially enabled (only Aspects, but some are not assigned due to the amount that has been removed in the 1.8 updates)
- Some config options are disabled due to the aforementioned
